title: Brad Marchand reveals he almost joined another Bruins rival in free agency

title: Celtics reportedly interested in trading for Clippers big man
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "It would have taken at least two first-round picks for the Clippers to consider parting with Zubac.
" Zubac would be a major upgrade to Boston's frontcourt.

(AP Photo/Lynne Sladky) If Brad Stevens and the Boston Celtics want to make upgrades before the NBA trade deadline, bolstering the team’s frontcourt makes plenty of sense as the team awaits the return of Jayson Tatum.

title: Patriots coach reportedly drawing interest for Cardinals head-coaching job
